Description: Handle sliver of Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Rectangular stamp. Clay fine light brown.
Curator's comments: Name Timotheos. The fragment is part of 1848,0731.269. Conservation number VRA102719. Also marked in ink, faded, 269.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (269)
